title: N172 old judge rarities sgc u name price!
author: JasonD08

posts.post_title: N172 old judge rarities sgc u name price!
posts.post_content:
I have the following Old Judge rare poses available.  You will see the pose and the last price reflected from VCP.  Each card has had the borders trimmed off with some small degree of light redish ink on letters on the fronts.  Most backs have a name stamp on them as well as a few with light pencil mark.  Nevertheless, extremely rare poses and are all slabbed authentic.  The names and photos are fully intact and legible.  I may be able to add scans later.  I will accept first reasonable offer on these.  Email them to [url]dduncanvintage@aol.com[/url].  Payment checks or MOs only.  I can accept CC through my own merchant account if need be.  Pay Pal will not be accepted.

Thanks
Jason

-Jim McCormick POR Chicago SGC 20 $4400+
-Jack Clements Hands on front recieving ball SGC 30 $178
-Jack Nelson Spotted Tie SGC 40 $1986
-Bill Watkins POR Suit SGC 10 $760
-Ernest Burch Brooklyn Hands cupped high.  N/A (leaning pose sold for SGC 10 $3650)
-Jack O'Brien Batting (uni completely colored red) N/A
-George Wood Throw SGC 20 $170
-Jack Farrell Taggin Paul Hines N/A tough pose $500-650?
-Jim Fogarty Hands cupped looking up to get ball N/A
-Jim McTamany one hand up to catch ball SGC 20 $241 SGC 10 $158
-Also have a nice 1887 Tobin Litho in SGC 20 of Mike Kelly baby talk series (clean front and back no paper loss.....card is actually VGEX)
-Also 1800's Tea Company SGC 30 Out on a Fly ( card is EX++ with clean back and sign of light pencil mark erasure on back very tough to see)

I would take $6500 for the entire group if someone would take them all.  

Thanks
Jason 816-294-9847

Just to clarify the prices and grades reflected are acutal sold cards off of VCP.  These are ALL grade SGC authentics due to mild border trimming.  Most have great imagry and appeal.  The ink is very minor on most of these as well. I hope there is no confusion.  Feel free to make offers individually on these.  

Thanks
Jason

Yes just email me at [url]dduncanvintage@aol.com[/url] for scans.  I do not have back scans but will describe.

Thanks
Jason

Cards sold and will be listed on ebay tonight under ID bishmasterb.

Thanks
Jason
